body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky, native. Son of Hayden Everett Stone and Sallie A. Stone. Married to Sophia Bainbridge Stone in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on June 1, 1864. Father of Mary Stone. Resident of Nelson County in 1850. Household owned three enslaved persons in Nelson County in 1850. Attorney in Louisville in 1860. Practiced law in the firm of Stone & Berry in partnership with William W. Berry in Louisville in 1861.
